summary: Amtrak is the national train company of the United States, offering inter-city travel. It was started in 1971 to run many passenger rail routes and gets money from the government but works like a regular business. Amtrak has a big network with over 500 stations and 21,400 miles of tracks. It serves millions of passengers yearly, with many trains running daily. Most trips are short, and many passengers come from big cities.
title: Amtrak
